#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <fstream>

using namespace std;

int T, N, A[100000];

int main()
{
	//ifstream cin ("main.in");

	int i, bp, ep;

	cin >> T;
	while (T--)
	{
		i = 0;
		
		cin >> N;
		while (i < N)
		{
			cin >> A[i];

			i++;
		}

		sort(A, A + N);

		bp = 0;
		ep = N - 1;

		i = 0;
		while (i < N)
		{
			if (i & 1)
				cout << A[ep--] << " ";
			else
				cout << A[bp++] << " ";  
		
			i++;
		}

		cout << endl;
	}

	return 0;
}
